text: ie, geuga seon chaelo gyeongbaeso-eseo yebaeleul deuligo iss-eul ttae cheonsadeul-i geuleul buleudeola. “sillo hananimkkeseo geudaeege yaheuya(yohan)ui gippeun sosig-eul jeonhasini, geuneun hananim-eulobuteoui malsseum-eul hwagjeunghaneun jaimyeo gogwihan jaloseo yeoseong-eul jeobchoghaji anhneun jaimyeo seonlyanghan jadeul-eseo naon seonjijaila.”
